titleStmt.title: Salmacis and Hermaphroditus Salmacida spolia sine sanguine & sudore.
Metamorphoses. Salmacis and Hermaphroditus. English
titleStmt.author: Ovid, 43 B.C.-17 or 18 A.D.
Beaumont, Francis, 1584-1616.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By S. Stafford] for Iohn Hodgets: and are to be sold at his shop in Fleete-street, at the signe of the Flowre de Luce, neere Fetter-lane,

notesStmt.note: A verse translation, by Francis Beaumont, from Ovid's Latin original.
Identified as STC 1666 on UMI microfilm reel 1227.
Appears at reel 1227 and at reel 1553 (both Bodleian Library copies).
Reproductions of the originals in the Bodleian Library.
